releaseNotes:
## Release Notes for version 2.5.1 (1234)

### Integrations
#### New Integrations
- MISP
-- Malware Information Sharing Platform and Threat Sharing
#### Modified Integrations
- Cylance Protect
-- Better error notifications
- EWS
-- Support querying multiple mailboxes
- ServiceNow
-- Support templates on ticket/incident creation




### Scripts
#### New Scripts
- AddEvidence
-- Adds provided entries to the incident Evidence Board. In playbook, can be positioned after a task to add the previous task's entries to Evidence Board automatically (with no need to provide arguments)

- misp_download_sample
-- Download malicious file sample from MISP
- misp_upload_sample
-- Upload malicious file sample to MISP
#### Modified Scripts
- EmailAskUser
-- Added support to send emails according to roles
- StringContains
-- Support looking for one substring out of a list
